name: Name

applyTo.name: Apply changes to
list: This & all related future recurring transactions {count}

transactionDeleteWarning: The transaction will be permanently deleted. Are you sure?
emptyListUpcoming: No transactions are planned for this period
deleteWarning: DANGER: This will permanently delete the entire {type} and ALL TRANSACTIONS without the ability to restore. Are you sure?
bulkDeleteWarning: Please be sure to select the right account and the right category type applicable to all selected transactions to avoid wrong currency conversion effects.
bulkMoveWarning: Please be sure to select the right account and the right category type applicable to all selected transactions to avoid wrong currency conversion effects.
transferMessage: You are about to make a transfer from one currency to another. Please enter the right incoming amount to make sure the conversion rate is right.
incomeCategoryExplained: Income transactions increase the account balance.
expenseCategoryExplained: Expense transactions decrease the account balance.
profitCategoryExplained: For business, profit is similar to expense because its taking money out of business and thus decreasing the account balance. The Profit checkbox allows you to visually group this kind of expenses into a separate blue columns.
notifyMeAlert: When due, the app will count & show this transaction right on the app icon
